Biographies

  • Robert Earl Keen biography

    Hailing from Houston, Texas, US, Robert Earl Keen Jr. (born January 11th, 1956) came to fame in the 80s and 90s through his country-tinged americana music that displayed a talent for penning honest, poetic songs.

    Read more

Live reviews

  • Robert Earl Keen Robert Earl Keen live review

    Texas born Robert Earl Keen Jr is an all American country singer from everything to his name to his style. He is a quintessential country crooner with a great set of country vocals and some pretty hefty guitar skills. …
